content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i stepped out of her apartment to go to the store at exactly 9:56. where she lives there is little light pollution.  we headed out and walked down the sidewalk, there was a full moon tonight and i remember i was going to comment on how the night sky would be perfect for telescopes.  i had looked up and there i saw 5 whitish discs in a diagonal straight formation. it was a perfect line. they must have been spread apart by 15-20 feet each. i dont know how high up they were but i know they were lower than any plane should be. i could see the under belly of these craft based on the little light in the area that was being reflected off.  i flipped out and ran around the other side of my girlfriends car and grabbed her head and pointed her eyes toward the spot where i saw them. at that time they were gone.  there were no lights and no sound. i was shaking so badly and my palms were sweating.  i always have wanted to see something like that but now, i dont want it, im scared and i wish there was an explanation...
content.summary: Five disc shaped objects gliding through the night sky in a perfectly straight diagonal formation

content.detailedDescription:
See description posted at...

http://www.Well.Com/user/satyr/755/globes.Txt

regarding the date of occurrence: i may have neglected to change the year on the initial form.  it was 1987.  also, i made an error in the initial date estimate; january 10th is closer than the 18th.  it might have been as early as the 7th or as late as the 14th, but definitely not as late as the 18th.

regarding other witnesses.  there were a few other cars on the road, so someone else must have seen what i saw.

regarding my vision: i later developed cataracts, but at that time my vision was still quite correctable.

regarding color vision: i have what is typically considered abnormal color vision, but i can still distinguish all primary and secondary colors.

regarding change in general health: i undertook a program of regular exercise and persisted at it for most of 1987.

regarding education: my degree is in biology, but required a two semester sequence in chemistry and another two semester sequence in physics.

regarding the condition of the sky: it was clear behind me, but cloudy ahead, with an electrical storm in the distance.

regarding elevation: at first appearance, the spheres were probably 30 degrees above the horizon from my perspective, and at the time that i lost track of them, probably 15 degrees.  in between they passed directly overhead.

regarding elevation: it might actually have been slightly more than 500 feet.  it's difficult to estimate since i can only guess at how big they were, and therefore how high, based on the size of the typical shrubs on the desert floor they were illuminating.  in any case, they were not obscured by clouds until they had proceeded very far ahead of me.

regarding distance: at closest approach they were only a few hundred feet overhead.  at first siting they might have been two miles behind me, and they were definitely many miles ahead when they disappeared.

regarding nature of flight path: they seemed to be moving in a straight line as they passed overhead, and then curved very gradually off to the left after moving some distance ahead.

regarding their surface characteristics: they were definitely glowing red (possibly monochromatic red), but there was also a moving mottled appearance to them which may have been a reflection of the desert below.

regarding their size: 31-100 feet seems most likely to be correct.  they might have been slightly smaller or slightly larger, but not by much in either direction.

regarding their initial appearance: it seemed abrupt to me, as though they'd just popped into the sky behind me.  i couldn't say whether the red light around me grew gradually or suddenly jumped from nothing to substantial, but as a professional driver in the habit of making use of my mirrors, i think i would have noticed them sooner had they followed the same approach path from much further away.
content.summary: Two bright red spheres approached from behind, passed overhead, and disappeared ahead in the distance.

content.detailedDescription: During each night of the full moon in january 2008, there was a really bright white light to the left of the full moon. i thought it was a star or planet but research showed no star or planet to be in that area of the sky. it was very bright white. the first night i saw it i didn't tink much of it and thought it was a very bright star or planet. then the second night i saw it i glanced up and noticed a red light was swirling around it intermittently. this is what caught my attention. i looked again and sure enough there was a red light along with the bright white light. i don't think any stars or planets were in that part of the sky that were that bright. it was really bright - bright white and looked like 10 really bright stars put together. it was there for several nights in a row during the full moon to the left then never seen again after full moon ended.
content.summary: Bright white and red light to left of full moon

content.detailedDescription: F89j aircraft
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witness viewed radar echo moving in straight line, aircraft scrambled, ufo chased briefly, and then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I went out by myself to get gas for my car at a near by gas station and decided to drive around for a little while afterward. i turned onto lindbergh going south from watson rd.( rt. 66)in sunset hills. driving down lindbergh i noticed some lights really low in the sky to the left of the road. at first i thought it was a helicopter and rolled down my window to listen and see if it was a helicopter. there was no noise whatsoever. it was just gliding slowly across the road. there were three white lights in a triangle on the bottom and around the edge there were all different colored lights strobing in a line around it. it must have been about 40 feet across if not more. i could not distinguish a shape just the lights. it went directly over my car and was only a couple hundred feet or less above me. i turned right onto a subdivision street to follow it but it was going north and the street i was on was going west. i turned around and got back on lindbergh  going north but it was already really far away and disappeared from sight. other people must have seen it because it was so ridiculously low. i wasn't scared or anything i was really excited because i had never seen one before but am interested in the subject.
content.summary: Ufo hovers low across street

content.detailedDescription: Above i am unsure of day, date,time or month. i do know it was within 24 hours of stephensville news. article in texas monthly has me writing this. i reported this to my wife and friends after first news later that night of stephensville-----------i am 64  retired and respected bussiness man on lake sam rayburn.   ok. on my back porch i have a panaramic view east to west. i was marvaling at the beautiful blue perfect sky. no clouds anywhere. the following is how my mind was working-----i saw a very large chrome shiny object come over east horizon many miles away. pretty plane?? now i can tell its going to pass completely over east to west in front of me. nothing but blue sky and no sun glint. my mind says that that is a big plane. next thought was where is vapor trail and its large beautiful and shiny. no vapor then must have props. but its bigger than the biggest plane. so i will hear something when its passes overhead. still no sound and no vapor and extremely long and large. dont know high but very high up and still large. mind says--hey wait a minute, there are no chrome airplanes that dont make noise are vapor. could i have seen the space station from here?? watched for 5-10 minutes then out of sight.  that night the stephensville news came on and i know directions. this object was in a line from louisiana to below dallas. that night is when i told my wife that i saw it.  then when they said it was mile long and 1/2 mile wide i said it easily could have been.  then days later on a ufo hunter show they showed a big long cigar shape object and my wife asked if thats what i saw and i said exactly.  i am home grown salt of the earth and i know what i saw and its nothing in it for me to spend 30 minutes typing this. ronnie
content.summary: Large long shiny--no sound-no vapor

content.detailedDescription:
As i was returning home from chicago traveling along westbound i-80, i noticed an extremely bright light in the sky to the west as i was passing the village of new lenox, il.  i thought that it may be an airplane traveling east, which would explain why it did not appear to move.  as i continued west, the light kept its brightness, and still did not move from its position.  as i crossed the des plaines river bridge in joliet, i noticed that there were now two extremely bright lights.  

as i drove alongside the west park area in joliet, i looked up from my driver's seat at the light source and saw a cross-shaped object silhouetted by the light, and hovering at about 80 feet above the ground.  i was traveling at approximately 60 mph, but was able to see this object clearly.  it had no similarity to a helicopter.  i had my window open, and could hear no sound above the road sound being made by my vehicle.  it was definitely not an airplane because of its nearness to the ground, and its absolutely stationary position.

as i continued west, i saw the second light, also along the south side of the interstate, but nearer the large garbage disposal area.  as i drove alongside this light, i again looked up and saw an exact duplicate of the previous cross-shaped object, silently hovering at about the same height above the ground.  as i passed, i thought to myself that i had just seen something very odd.

i am a professional person that has never witnessed anything out of the ordinary, but this was a very strange observance.
content.summary: Saw two extremely bright lights while driving west along i-80 in joliet, il.   silent objects hovering.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a long time ago but somethings you never forget: i was a p/t mobile dic jockey at that stage of my life but had just graduated from c.E.T. (center for employment training ) and was working on my second job after taking second course(1st job was at watxxxs johxxxn) after going back to school to add to my studies (microwave theory)- (my studies where in electronic eng.)@ telxxxne micxxxxve in palo alto.

i was drivng from hollister california where i had just played music for an outdoor party ( friends party) and was on my way to play another party in san jose california, i remeber i was suppose to arrive at the party about 8 pm so i left hollister about 6-6:30 ( i was running late). the sun was coming down, and weather was changing as i drove in gilroy california.  i took 156 hwy to 101 hwy north ( had to pick up extra equipment in san juan baustist (my home).

just after passing morgan hill i noticed a bright blue/red light traveling
along my side, i figured about 1-2 mile on my left side. at first i thought a helicopter because a plane wouldn't be flying that low, it look like it was flying about my speed then it shot 2-3 mile in front of me in an instant. i didn't relize this at first, i just thought oh these guys turned off there lights. as drove on i saw the light again in a field near a small lake but i notice it wasn't moving so i slowed down.

then something amazing happen: the disc light up and you could see the disc shape semi oval with what at first didn't notice small windows in the center area. the bottom half of the disc look like it was rotating and the top light seem to dim down so i could see the size of it ( size of a football field).

i almost lost it (driving) becuse i could beleive what i was seeing, then just as quick as it light up again it shut it light off again and moved another 2-3 mile ahead ( i knew this becuse this time there was nothing to block my view-mountain, hills, trees).

i then got kinda excited and keep thinking this is hoax, this can't be real, but how can a blimp travel so quickly, i speed up to finally catch up to it just outside of san jose california near tully road exit. i stopped my car along the side of the road and got off as the blinking light got closer, i could'nt see the disc just the lights.

then suddenly just like the first time, again it stopped, no sound of engines no sound period, then the lights at the bottom lite up... only that then, i saw something i had not noticed the first time, the windows seemed much closer and i could see figures in the wondows walking back and forth from one side of the disc to the other.. i was in shock because i knew then that this wasn't a hoax, i don't know how long i was stareing but if it hadn't started raining i might have not snapped out of it.

i jumped in my car and proceed to honk at passing car's to see if somebody was seeing what i was seeing, but started raining harder so i couldn't tell. just as i drove into san jose i decided to stop again because the disc lite up again and i was hoping somebody would stop with me.
 the disc had crossed over me and now was hovering on my right side at least 300-500 ft above the homes in the area, then i did hear a sound.. which at first i thought came from the disc but soon relized it wasn't.

the disc shot straight up at incredible speed and the sound i hear was 2 jet fighters coming in fast and low, the came in above and shot up in the same direction the disc ( it was dark but i could see there after burners ( that how i know ther was 2 jets) direction and the last sound i heard was a sonic boom,  i believe came from the 2 jet fighters i believe to have gone to mac speed.

well, i got to party late (9-9:30) but most of the people there where allready a little tipsy so no one beleived me. its get better, i made a lot of phone calls the next day to military bases and police (moffet field around the corner) but there where no reports filed on that night on my siteing, i told my friends, co-workers, and bosses in telxxxne and the next day they had put a giant flyer in the warehouse with cartoon pictures of me and aliens saying" jose's see's little green men".

year's later i was watching tv and a special came out about ufo and there was a picture draw by a man which decribed the same ufo i had seen, almost 10 years later. i was happy to see it, i knew then i wasn't seeing things.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovering  saucer shape

content.detailedDescription: Please see all of my earlier reports...There is a craft in the air and when you adjust the brightness and contrast they are in behind the trees as well as in front...Pictures from yesterday are already submitted.  taken from over 500 ft. away while in a parking lot.
content.summary: One in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
On thurs., march 6, 2008 we had a good snow here in plano, tx.  that evening   12:58 am march 7th, i started taking pictures from my balcony of what i thought was an orb under a tree(i'm familiar with ufos and orbs).  i've lived here for several years and frequently enjoy my view.  this night was especially interesting because of the snow.  this was the first time i had ever seen, what i thought to be at the time, an orb from my balcony.

i don't know what to call it so i will just refer to it as "the light."

in the attached pictures, the times and dates are correct and no photos have been altered or doctored in any way, shape, form or fashion.

the light was on until i went to bed.  i'm not sure what time that was but the last picture was taken at 1:35 am.

i'm going to give you my story along with the pictures for simplification.  the pics i'm sending are huge.  my camera is a nikon d40x, 10k megapixil.  most of the shots were take w/ a 200 mm lens.  the shots taken on the 7th are shaky, didn't have a tripod and the exposures were very long.  the shots on the other evenings were taken w/ a tripod but are still not especially clear because the exposure was very long and it's hard to focus a digital camera in the dark (think i got it figured out now).

picture dsc_0031 -  resize the shots in photoshop or whatever you prefer and you'll be able to follow me.  this pic gives you an idea of where the light is in conjunction from where the pic is being taken (please note this was not taken on the first sighting of the light).  on the bottom of the pic is the railing on my balcony.  along the fence line you can see four trees.  the second tree from the left, look at the base of the tree and follow up the base to almost the top.  just to the left you can see a an orange light...Bingo.  the white object to the far left in the tree line is a plastic garbage bag.  on the three occasions that i saw the light, it appeared in the exact same place.  i estimate the distance to be 150-200 yards from me.  speaking for all three occasions, i did not experience anything out of the ordinary other than seeing the light.

it looks as if i can only attach three pics here.  i'll be happy to send more to your email address.  i'm not sending pics from the first sighting in the snow.  those are the worst ones in the batch (no tripod).

dsc_0027 - taken march 10, 12:28 am.  just happened to look out and there it was.

dsc_0035 - i never saw those green lights to the left of the light.

i'm going to nutshell this, i have to run.

on the 18th i found a great way to brace my binoculars.  i did not and never did see what one would think of as an orb.  what i saw...I swear to god, looked like glowing yellow, orange or gold light (never saw the actual source of this glow/light) with sparks rotating "in" the light at varying speeds, brightness and intensity. the "sparks" themselves did not seem to be the source of light that they were contained in.  the "sparks" more or less seemed to spin horizontally to the ground in a clockwise motion.  i spent hours watching this and i'm still floored.  the detail was amazing.  i would see "sparks" outside of the glow and most of those seemed to keep appearing in the same places, mostly just to right of the light.

bottom line - i have tried to get to the source of the light but have had no luck, will explain later.  if you have any researchers in my neck of the woods, i'd be more than happy to interview with them.  more than that, i'd like to have someone on call.  should i see the light again, they can come over and take a look for themselves.  

give me a call.  

p.S. the three nights i saw the light had one thing in common...It was colder than usual.  i know, big surprise.
content.summary: Not a ufo, anomaly, have seen it in the same place march 7th, 10th, and 18th 2008

content.detailedDescription:
Peace and love to everyone.
tim here we go.  
being from chicago i love looking at the night sky.  it was about three am tuesday march 11 2008 up near delevan lake.  i had moved myself outside with my dog to look at the stars.  aside from the chemtrail being sprayed (yes at 3am) i saw on the horizon some lights that looked like planes on their flightpaths. there was another light that glowed ivory in color and i noticed it was going at a steady rate and then slowing down. this happened maybe three times. when i realized that this was nothing i had ever seen before due to the missing characteristic saftey lights on the wings, etc and the movement patterns the object then more than tripled in size as it glowed a purple color. then it was gone. 
well i was blown away here i had a real ufo experience.  the following day at sunset yea a stunning chemtrail sunset i parked my vehicle close to a field and watched. 
as i watched a plane flying northeast and wondered where the object and its living passengers might be, what looked like a gray plane on a similar path as the first moved closer to where i was parked.
instantly perhaps telepathically i recognized the object not as a plane. and just like that the object glowed and then another time with the same intensity in succession an orangereddishviolet color.  so i turned to secure my vehicle and bring my dog to the center of the field.  in nervous excitement i rushed and as i turned to move closer to the object it was moving away from me and disappeared into the "clouds". 
 allright the third was saturday 15march o8 and driving back to chicago on hwy 50 driving east i noticed a light among the stars that seemed different. by this time i had made the walmart run to get binoculars.  i saw a light that was vibrating with color from white to red green blue some orange and purple and moving randomly forward backward up down and more.
a state trooper came up to check on why i was there and i handed him the binoculars to see for himself. his take was an airplane in a holding pattern. 
 let me finish by stating that for me this experience was nonthreatnening in fact loving and peaceful.  trusting this will benefit us all as we travel together on this exciting path, shaping the story of our times. 
i bless you and thank you all.
in truth peace love and joy
ana
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Light moved and slowed down and resumed rate then glowed bright purple/red

content.detailedDescription: Looked out bedroom window about 5:30am central time and saw and unusal light in the southern sky. i figured it would be gone before i could get my video camera set up. there were no red or green lights flashing on it as required by the faa so i continued to watch the light while my ex went and got binoculars. after veiwing the light through the binoculars, i decided i should get the video camera (sony ccd tr940). i set the camera up using a tripod and recorded for ~1hr. the quality is similar to the some of the mexican ufo's filmed during the full eclispe several years ago. the light is pulsing and changes size significantly. at times it goes from the size of a dime on the tv screen to the size of a beach ball(entire screen full). it moves very little but does move some. it was moving when i first saw it, going from due south toward the west and up at a 45degree angle. it then reached a spot in the ssw sky where it stopped and remained relatively still for about an hour. although the camera was not able to pick it up after the sun had risen, i could still see it with my naked eye for some time after the video was unable to detect it. if you want to see the video contact me at the number provided above and  i will make it available. it's definately not a plane, helicopter, star, or planet. as the day got brighter the object gradually faded until you couldn't see it even with the naked eye.
content.summary: Video of ufo taken this morning

content.detailedDescription:
Looked out my bathroom window about 5:30am and saw a bright light moving from directly south of my house toward the west. as i watched it i noticed there was no sound and this bright light coming from a cylinder shaped object had no red or green lights on it as a plane would. i continued to watch it for about 5 mintues as it moved up and toward the west until it reached a spot in the ssw sky and appeared to stop and remain for at least an hour. i got my video camera off my dresser and went outside and set up a tripod and took video for about 50 mintues. the light can be seen on the video changing size and shape for ~50 mintues until it got bright enough outside that the light could no longer be seen in the video. i could still see it with my naked eye but was no longer able to see it on video. i then went inside and veiwed the video on my television. the light sometimes gets 10 times bigger but moves very little. it appears to have taken up a position in the sky and remains there until the sun eventually gets bright enough so the camera no longer picks it up. i am able to see it for another 10 mintues with my naked eye but shut the video off because it can no longer be seen by the camera. the video shows some very unusal shape and size changes. i have contacted 3 local television stations to see if they are interested in observing the video and am waiting for their response.I am 55 years old and saw a disc shaped ufo in december 1965, in pittsburgh pa. which was 30' across and my mother and step father all witnessed this object which was only 30' away and going about 2mph at tree top level. i was so close i could see the tops of equipment racks (baby blue) through the windows on the ufo. since then i have seen nothing unusal until today. i did witness ball lighting in the mid 80's while driving north on mopac in austin, texas where i now live. i never for one mintue though it was a ufo and i don't want to say this object was but the video shows some very unusal size and shape changes while the sony ccd tr 940 recorded this object for over 50 mintues. if your interested in veiwing this video contact me soon. i would like for you to veiw it before any news media  gets it. i don't trust anyone because i know the government can & will cover this up if they get half a chance. i am also interested in becoming one of your field operators for this area. there have been many reports lately of ufo's in this area. stephenville and lake travis have reported ufo's in the last 6 months. the reports say the ufo was cigar shape and extremely large (1 mile long). i never heard of ufo's this large before. the reports i've heard in the past were of cigar shaped ufo's about 300 to 400 yds. long.Anyway, contact me soon as i would like your people to see this video before any news or government get a hold of it. we know they can not be trusted. thank you and have a great day.

                                                 jas
content.summary: Have ~50min. of video shot this morning. not a plane, star, or planet

content.detailedDescription:
On march 6, 2008

my husband's alarm clock went off at 5:15 am and he got up to get ready for work.  at this point, i was awake laying in bed hoping to get back to sleep, clock now reading 5:17 am, as i rolled over and stared out the window at two dim white stars in the sky to the left of the grants pass peak, i then noticed that the star to the right of the other one was moving very slowly eastward.  as it moved slowly through the easterly sky the dim light got brighter and it appeared to get larger in size.  i jumped out of bed to watch it out my window as it continued to move to the east and to my surprise it started zig zagging upward and downward in the sky for a few seconds.  at this point i knew for sure it wasn't any airplane or helicopter.  it went back to its previous position and headed east once again.  still in my view, i continued watching it and then it did something i didn���t expect it to do and that is drop downward in the sky and circle around heading westward back in the direction it came.  the bright light and large size appeared to be getting smaller as it started dimming as it continuing moving westerly and then it disappeared.  i was thinking i had seen the last of it when it appeared further to the west and after a few seconds of watching it once more disappeared for the last time.

our house guest saw something similar to what i saw eight hours previous while using our spa.
content.summary: Ufo flying over grants pass peak in murphy oregon

content.detailedDescription:

wild life refuge taking pictures when i accidently captured a ufo. zoom in on what appears to be the moon. i never saw the object with my own eyes.
content.summary: I don't know what this box is for

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i and a friend of ours were hiking into to some hot springs located a short distance from our house, just outside of taos, nm.  the hike is an easy 1/2 mile hike and it was in the last dregs of twilight on a warm september evening, where there is still enough light to see fairly well. the sun had set maybe 10 -15 minutes before and the sky was clear, with the first few stars starting to appear.  

about 400 yards into the walk we heard a low rumbling sound coming from above and behind us, i looked up and saw the biggest object i have ever seen in the air.  it looked like a giant flying metal building, you know the kind the put up on farms all over the mid-west.  very un-aerodynamic looking indeed, with a pair of short stubby rear-swept wings attached about level with the base of the object and located about mid-fuselage.

this thing was absolutely enormous and it was hard to get an appreciation for it's real size until i noticed that it was making no sound at all and the rumbling was coming from 2 fighter jets escorting this thing. it looked like this ufo was very low at first (maybe 500ft high), but i think that was an illusion due the object's massive size, on closer examination, the fighter jets looked miniscule flying in formation next to this thing.  this object was hundreds of times larger than the fighters escorting it.  a f16 fighter jet is 49' 5" long, and i would estimate that the object was at least 20 times longer if not more like 30 times it's size, which would give it a length of 1,000 - 1,500 ft or aircraft carrier sized, only wider than an aircraft carrier (the uss nimitz is 1,092 ft long).  

we stood there speechless watching in fascination as the 3 craft (object and 2 fighter escorts) flew almost directly over us.  when it was over we all turned and looked at each other and someone said "what the heck was that?" i think that the realization that it was obviously a man-made craft kept us from being scared, my reaction was one of fascination and excitement at seeing such a huge object, obviously of human origin flying just above us. wonder about the technology behind such a device and what the heck is it used for and how do they keep something so big a secret.  we lost sight of the object when it flew over the mountain that we were at the base of.

the obejct and it's jet escort were traveling in a southeasterly direction. we observed the craft and it's escort for about 1 - 1.5 minutes while they flew almost directly over us.  it looked like they were flying so slowly that the fighter jets were struggling to stay in the sky, but on further reflection, i think this also was an illusion due to the enormous size of the object.

other things i remember: at the center of the fuselage on the underside, there was a soft white light emitted from rectangular area directly between the wings, about as long as the wing attachment and about 1/2 as wide as the fuselage. the sides were vertical from the bottom of the object straight up, until it met the "roof". the back end of the object was flat and looked like a steel farm building, complete with pointed roof.

none of us had been drinking at that point and we were not using any other mind-altering substance.  we all saw it and remarked upon it and have discussed it many times since.  this object was definitely man-made, but is not listed in any catalog of military aircraft that is available to the public.  besides the three of us, i have talked to 2 other people who live relatively  near taos (within 75 miles), that have seen either the same object or something very similar, both of these witnesses also saw fighter jets escorting the object at the time of their encounter as well.

unfortunately, we did not have any type of camera with us at the time (last time i ever go hiking without one!). but i have provided a drawing of what the object looked like.

in the 2 years since i have seen the object, i have reflected on what we saw that night and i have wished many times that i had carried a camera with me that night.  however, i probably would have been too dumb-struck to actually use it had i had one.  i and my hiking partners all feel that this object was man made and some type of secret military aircraft with technology that was far more advanced than anything we have been led to believe is currently available.
content.summary: Stadium-sized, man-made ufo over taos, nm, seen with military fighter jet escort

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving for work at 535am this morning. i stop at starbucks to get my regular coffee. i took eastbound kettleman rd. to alpine exit. i turn right on alpine going southbound when i notice a bright red and green light low in altitude. the light where not blinking. as i got closing the light where not moving but stationary. i slow down as i got closier to the lights. when i was right above the ufo it look triangle in shape. i would guess it was less then 1ooo ft. above the ground. as soon as i stop it disappear. i know my aircrafts well. i know most planes have white lights that blink. at the time no other cars where on the road. as i got closier i started to panic a little because i was the only person out here. this craft knew i was watching it because as soon as i came to a dead stop it cloak our disappear. it could be a secret military plane. i also did not here any sound. this craft was very low. guessing the size 75ft across.
content.summary: Sighting was 4 miles southeast of lodi on alpine rd.

content.detailedDescription:
Alright, at the time my dogs weren't housebroken yet, so i was outside at about 9:00pm walking around the backyard, waiting for them to go. i just happened to yawn and look up and see this thing. i was slow, and silent, but it was massive, and moving over my head. i knew it was rectangular from the 4 lights in the corners, and how it was bleeping out stars. it went into the distance and started to rotate. and then... it blinked out.
i've never seen it since but i wonder, was it real, or what?I mean at first i thought it was a plane. but,
1.To big
2.It rotated
and 3. it was dead silent
the whole time i just gawked and stared at it until it dissapeared. i wish i knew what it was.
content.summary: Black. rectangular. big.

content.detailedDescription:
at the date listed above i was outside for a smoke, when i noticed a what i (at the time) perceived to be 3 lights in a triangular shape flying east, the middle (which is to say the lead light) was like a spotlight the other two were inactive (just 2 lights) that looked (from my position) to be angled slightly downward. at this point i should point out 2 things 

a) it was flying at an altitude slightly lower then that of a normal passenger liner with no sound i could hear (though it drove my dog nuts)  

b) i'm a specialist in the united states army national guard, and an iraqi war vet. i'm well aware of what i'm saying.

now, as it came closer (moving no faster the a car on a side street) it became clear i was looking at a diamond not a triangle, the interesting thing here is that (again) all 4 lights appeared to be angled downward suggesting to me that i was seeing a "stealth" diamond craft, so i decided to chase it, i did so for about half a block till i reached a street corner (every so often looking up to make sure i hadn't lost it) when i got to said corner the thing stopped, as did i. i just stood there staring up at it for about 30 sec. or so when the lights just disappeared and i was left staring into space like an idiot.

now you're probably saying to yourself "he says lights in a diamond shape, but never describes a craft of any type." "just angled light in a diamond formation." and you're absolutely correct in that observation, the reason i didn't describe a craft is because i didn't see one! all i saw were for angled lights moving in a consistent diamond shape for a distance at a consistent speed for a half a block silently that just disappeared in front of my eyes. those light couldn't have maintained that consistent a formation while remaining at that same angle and maintaining that speed if they weren't part of a craft. 
i'd love an (private) explanation thank you.
content.summary: For lights forming a diamond

content.detailedDescription:
at 9:52 am i was driving to work heading west on peavy road, at peavy and buckner i noticed what i first thought to be a large airplane hanging over the lake or the neighbor hood behind the lake. it was dark black almost like a shadow but it was odd because it was not flying just hanging there. it was very low to be that big of a plane. i would estimate about 15 stories or a mini skyscraper. anyway as i was driving toward it was getting larger and more visible so i know it was not moving. at first it looked like a f-16 type of plane but on steroids because it was at least the size of a jumbo jet. it also had sharp edges or jagged just like a fighter would.I was driving and it was on my left when i got up closer it seemed to turn into different colors almost like it had spots that changed it seemed as if it were alive almost. it seemed to morph a little, at first i thought i saw wings but then i could not find wings. it had a bubble like dome on top with a gold blob or maybe it was a light inside it. i finally found a spot to pull off into the neighborhood, there were many trees and by the time i found a clearing it had vanished completely. i looked at the clock it was 9:58 am.
at first i was excited but as i got closer i was afraid, it was like my mind just could not comprehend what i just saw. i think it was some sort of disguise and the closer i got the illusion that it was a plane was gone. as i write this later in the afternoon it is becoming increasingly more difficult to picture it. the odd thing is the people around driving did not seem to see it. my husband who was 2 minutes behind me never saw it, he said he was making a call at the time.
content.summary: It hung silently in the air as i was driving it got closer.

content.detailedDescription:
Once again i am seeing these things in the same place and no one seems to care.  i have taken photo's of this area almost daily for almost a year to come to establish some kind of credibility to what i report and have already reported quite frequently.  i have some of the many photos posted at http://fdinwidy7.Tripod.Com/  
 i've read you now have a response team for things like this.  it would seem to me that if a person is reporting these things from and around the same area for the past 8 months intensive investigation might be warranted...A phone call???...Something.  i now have the state dept. and a place called saic constantly on my website and so i don't know if i have attracted the wrong crowd... anyway i'm still here...Me and my camera.  i also found it odd to see drone footage on ufo hunters and in an interview with the international director of mufon the director stated he had not received photo's of the drone from anyone willing to reveal themselves...I think i've crossed that threshold.  in fact i believe i sent the one on my site into mufon several months ago.
content.summary: Once again i am seeing these things in the same place.

content.detailedDescription:
I have already made reports of 3 sightings,2 of which were pretty close to us, there are re-occurring events , now taking place about every other night,(with the exception of the 2/3 nights of rain lately,no sightings in the rain)i'll tell of the one's i wrote down... on the 16th of march at approx. 11:42p.M. my husband & i decided to go out front and look at the stars, but it was too cloudy to see any,so we watched the clouds pass over the moon ,husband not impressed was ready to go back in, as he stepped onto the porch i noticed this thick white line over top our house,looked like a light i thought ,& said what's above our house right here, husband looks & says it looks like a jet line or power line lit up,but we don't have a power line there, he agreed & as he said that , it totally disappeared all at once , not a portion at a time like a jet line would evaporate, but like a switch just turned it off.We agreed that that was very odd,and continued looking around the sky then.To the s.W. of our house we noticed something flashing in the sky,watched it for a few min. & went inside.Husband thought nothing of it & went to shower, i got binoculars out to look at it... it was definately hovering,it didn't get smaller or larger,was approx. the size of a penny through binocs. & had many lights flashing off/on like tree lights blink,all at diff. time sequence.Had my teen come look he could make out colors,red,blue,mainly & bright white big light in center.I lined it up w/our utility pole,it wasn't moving...Stayed there for almost exactly an hour and then just dissappeared like it turned off it's lights.
  then, on 3-20-08,the other sighting that lasted awhile, 3am exact, dogs had been quiet all night til now,barking ,whimpering,wouldn't go after whatever it was they saw/heard, like they normally would,so i looking around the property and all around,don't see anything out there,til i look up...Right out to the north ,above the house,there's one of them again, i get the binocs. to look closer, same red,blue rows of lights as before w/white light in middle, white light goes off while i'm watching, then another white light comes zig zag blipping across in front of the other,it moved great leaps between lightings,coming from east,where i see 2 more ,all hovering but the one zig zagger, then another in the north near first one.Now there's like 5 of these things,just hanging out around my house.The one to the east is closer to my house it looks to have a white light on the end or on top ,it kindof looks like a cockpit but larger ,can't tell for sure,some of them have red light in center w/more blue around perimeter,some red there too,& they all look like triangles from the position of lights.At approx. 4:07a.M. all but the first 2(closest to the house) disappeared .The 1 north raised higher and turned white,like a star, east 1 still red center,blue mainly on points/some red&,white lt. on end or top. took photos but they didn't show anything oddly enough. they stayed & i watched till 4:07a.M.,then i decided to go to bed,so i got ready & came back for one more look(dogs both calm by this point) and "they" were all gone...Just gone,they sat there that long & i walk away for 5 min. & they disappeared, i even ventured outside to see if they just moved,they were nowhere in sight.I don't know who could do anything about it but for someone who's always been intrigued by ufos...I'm a little freaked out & would like someone to do something,if possible.These are definately something & i see them very well through binocs., they are real and here at my location.
content.summary: About every other night for 3 wks., we see these "things"around our area,sometimes up high, sometimes very close

content.detailedDescription:
I have already made reports of 3 sightings,2 of which were pretty close to us, there are re-occurring events , now taking place about every other night,(with the exception of the 2/3 nights of rain lately,no sightings in the rain)i'll tell of the one's i wrote down... on the 16th of march at approx. 11:42p.M. my husband & i decided to go out front and look at the stars, but it was too cloudy to see any,so we watched the clouds pass over the moon ,husband not impressed was ready to go back in, as he stepped onto the porch i noticed this thick white line over top our house,looked like a light i thought ,& said what's above our house right here, husband looks & says it looks like a jet line or power line lit up,but we don't have a power line there, he agreed & as he said that , it totally disappeared all at once , not a portion at a time like a jet line would evaporate, but like a switch just turned it off.We agreed that that was very odd,and continued looking around the sky then.To the s.W. of our house we noticed something flashing in the sky,watched it for a few min. & went inside.Husband thought nothing of it & went to shower, i got binoculars out to look at it... it was definately hovering,it didn't get smaller or larger,was approx. the size of a penny through binocs. & had many lights flashing off/on like tree lights blink,all at diff. time sequence.Had my teen come look he could make out colors,red,blue,mainly & bright white big light in center.I lined it up w/our utility pole,it wasn't moving...Stayed there for almost exactly an hour and then just dissappeared like it turned off it's lights.

content.summary: About every other night for 3 wks., we see these "things"around our area,sometimes up high, sometimes very close

content.detailedDescription: It was a sunday afternoon. it had been sprinkling rain on and off through out the day, there was complete cloud cover. i was in a coffee shop drive through. when directly in front of my truck about 200 yards out, right under the cloud cover something caught my eye. it was a dark black dome shaped hovering object just below the clouds. it was just enough under the clouds to be fully exposed. it looked to be the size of a large suv, & about 8 feet tall at the peak of its hight. i asked the coffee girl to take a look. we were both stunned. we had no idea what we were looking at, i have never seen any thing like this. it made no noise that we could hear, and there were no lights to speak of. i'm not sure how long it was there before i saw it. but about 15 seconds after i first saw it, it very slowly went up in to the clouds. i was kind of scared cause i've never seen anything like this. but i saw the mutual ufo network on the history channel and thought maybe someone could explaine what we saw that afternoon.
content.summary: Dark black dome shaped. (flat on the bottom and a distictive dome top)

content.detailedDescription:
I'm so glad that i found a serious active site to tell my story. i was born in 1967 ( so i'll be 40 years old in may 2008 ). i had 2 sightings of the same nature between the ages af 5 and 15 approximately in the same village where i grew up ( les escoumins, quebec, canada). here we go...

1- i was about 5 to 7 years old. it was after diner , maybe 6 or 7 pm in the summer. i was in the kitchen with my family which is the family room in our house. one of my sisters started screaming, asking us tocome in the solarium to see this huge object that looked like a giant fireball. it was going on a straight horizontal path over the nearby mountains. it was heading south-west on a steady speed and crossed the entire horizon without leaving any trace of smoke behind. it took about 5 minutes to cross the horizon visible from where we were. really fast, the phone rang and neighbours who were observing the same phenomenon were calling to ask if we were seing the same thing in the sky.  i really felt like it was a huge fireball, several times the diameter of the sun, orange like. i was very young but i could tell that no one was able to explain what it was.  

2- several years later when i was young teenager, i heard of car accident about half a kilometer from our home. it was in the summertime;at about 9pm.  there was no lamp post on that section of the street which was uphill from our house. i went to see the accident but it was all over when i got there so i headed back home, walking down the hill. as i was lookin west ( halfway to my right ), i saw the exact sae fireball i had seen years ago. this time it was much further away . it was going in the north-east direction this time. it was a surreal object. exactly the same description as the object i had seen before. it lasted only for a couple of minutes as i lost sight of it over the trees. we were used to see military jets all the time in the area since i was a yung child and it had nthing to do with it. i would call it a real fireball. no noise at all and no smoke trail.  going at a steady speed horizontally. no change of direction. 

that's all i've seen. never seen anything like that ever again in my life. i've seen shooting stars ,  northern lights, military jets a multitude of times in my life and i can tell you that it was none of those objects. 

thank you.  steve
content.summary: Fireball in the sky ( 2 sightings, several witnesses )

content.detailedDescription: When i was looking outside my window i saw a several flashing object exploding on the sky.
content.shape: Blimp,  Bullet,  Missile,  Fireball,  Flash,  Sphere,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Flashing objects

content.detailedDescription: I sighted a spinning hovering disc over the woods at the dead end of theriot avenue in the bronx on a summer evening in 1995 or 1996.  the spinning, hovering disc remained stationery for a while (i was so stunned it may have been longer or shorter than i remember) and abruptly disappeared.  the disc was rimmed with many brightly colored rectangles.  there were many witnesses pointing to the sky.  a neighbor was filming the event.  i am hoping someone will corroborate my account.
content.summary: Hovering disc over woods on theriot avenue

content.detailedDescription:
My sister and i went to a place called empire lakes docks in coos bay.  we were sitting looking at the sky and thinking about the death of our sister-in-law less than a year gone.  we were crabbing as well and it was cold ( explaining why we were in the truck instead of sitting on the dock. )  as we were talking i was looking up and i saw a star moving in unusual ways.  it was going up and down and sideways.  it was also flashing almost winking at me.  i told my sister to look to see if she saw what i saw and she was amazed!  the whole thing only lasted about a minute or a minute and a half and then it was gone in a flash!  we were both amazed.
another time i was in shady cove oregon living on bond rd.  there were alot of people at my house maybe 8 or 9 including my father.  it was getting loud as everyone but me were drinking.  i asked my friend who also was drinking if she wanted to go for a walk?  she said yes and we started walking down my long dirt driveway.  we got about a 75 feet away from the house in the dark and i heard a loud whirring sound that sounded errie.  i pushed the on the light to my watch and saw the hands spinning around very fast.  i looked around and saw nothing but felt as though something was watching me in the tree's!  i started back with my friend to the house and said nothing to anyone.  this happened about november 10th, 1996.  it was about 11:00pm.  the whole thing lasted about 3 minutes before i headed home.  after i got home i was uneasy all night waiting for something or someone to appear.  i slept with the lights on all night and my back against the wall.
then in 1983 i was living with friends in visalia california.  my son slept in their daughters bedroom in a bunk bed on the top and she on the bottom as he was older than her.  my friend dewayne and jodie slept in their room and i slept on the couch.  we all went to bed about 9:00pm.  i was dreaming that i was dematerialized through the ceiling, my next memory was uneasyness, dematerialized back through the ceiling and dropped to the couch from about a foot.  the shock of it made me gasp and woke me up!  it was very real and i got up scared and turned on the light and looked around seeing nothing. i checked on the children and they were ok.  i made some coffee and drank it shook up.  dewayne came out of his room and asked what i was doing?  i told him i could not sleep and after the cup of coffee i was going to bed.  he said ok and went back to bed.  i never told him or his wife what happened.  i looked at the clock and it was about 2:00am  i have no idea how long anything happened only that it was 2:00am.  
i saw another ufo in colorado off the side of the road parked getting ready to sleep.  i was really tired and i pulled off the side of the road and parked.  i decided to smoke a cigarette before sleeping.  i lit the cigarette and was looking out over the fields at the ranch houses in the distance about a mile from where i was parked.  all of a sudden i saw a light come out of nowhere and shine down on the ground in the field below. i could not really see what it looked like because all i saw was te light shining down to the ground which looked to be about 20 feet around. it stayed on about 35 seconds and went off!  i woke my husband up to look and it disappeared in 2 seconds to the sky!  this happened in july of 1979 at 3:30 am  the whole thing lasted all of about 4 minutes from the time i first saw it to the time i tried to wake my husband.  i was excited by what i saw but amazed at the same time.
content.summary: Made fast flashy movements and disappeared after 1 and a half minutes.
